code: import React from'react';import'./Categories.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Categories(){const categories=[{id:'ponchos',name:'Ponchos',icon:'fas fa-tshirt',description:'24 productos • Desde S/. 89'},{id:'polleras',name:'Polleras',icon:'fas fa-female',description:'18 productos • Desde S/. 75'},{id:'chalecos',name:'Chalecos',icon:'fas fa-vest',description:'15 productos • Desde S/. 95'},{id:'chales',name:'Chales',icon:'fas fa-scarf',description:'12 productos • Desde S/. 45'}];const handleCategoryClick=category=>{alert("Navegando a categor\xEDa: ".concat(category));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"categories",id:"categorias",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section-title",children:"Nuestras Categor\xEDas"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"category-grid",children:categories.map(category=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"category-card",onClick:()=>handleCategoryClick(category.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"category-image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:category.icon})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"category-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:category.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:category.description})]})]},category.id))})]})});}export default Categories;
